name: Asteroid Clicker
description:
Asteroid Clicker is my first game project.

Click Asteroids to mine resources. Your fuel determines how long you can mine for in a certain stage. After you run out of fuel and the stage is finished you earn money for the resources you've mined and you're able to upgrade your ship.

Please try the Android version, the game is meant to be played on smart phones.

If you're downloading the Windows version, please try and run in full screen with a high resolution, or the UI will be broken.
